data.text: Krais nden ndavi havhari. Ana guigira wo ndavar nde nɨɨŋgiap, ndava mɨɨtɨgar nde ndɨɨim, nde ki. Nde vhɨra Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaara kɨrɨ tɨvir ki. Nde vhɨra tɨvara vhuun wari ga mbuav wari kora mbui.

Krais maaŋ nden muuŋgim, nde ndava bavira kɨrim, gu guigira ndikndigɨrga. Nde za ndɨkndɨk bavira suirav, tɨva bavira zɨn ŋgɨp nde guigira wari won ndavir warir nɨɨŋgiri. Nde guigira wari tɨgɨp ndava bavira kɨri.
2.3: Ro 12.10; Ga 5.26; Ef 5.21; Fi 1.15-16; Ze 3.14Nde warira ndɨkndɨgɨp, zɨ bakɨmen warira nɨɨŋ thari. Fhuvara. Nde wari mbevav, kha ndɨkndɨgar warir muuŋri, mben tɨvi nden tɨvi kambarigi.
2.4: 1 Ko 10.24; 10.33; 13.5Nde wari wo bigira ganɨ thari. Fhuvara. Nde bevbevira, nde za wari wo bigi ganɨv, warir kurkurari.
Nde Krais Zisas suirigi ndɨkndɨgara suirari.
2.6: Zo 1.1-2; 5.18; 10.33; 17.5; 2 Ko 4.4; Kor 1.15; Hi 1.3Ana Fhe Bakɨ guar ma. Ana ne ndɨkndɨgap, ana Fhe Bakɨ guar ki tɨva muuŋgiap ki fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara!
2.7: Zo 1.14; 2 Ko 8.9; Ga 4.4; Hi 2.14; 2.17Ana wo vuzvugara mba tɨva thav, ana fhura ŋaara guma khɨn ki. Ana guma guara fara muuŋgiap ki.

2.8: Mt 26.39; 26.42; Zo 10.17-18; Ro 8.3; Hi 5.8; 12.2Kha gumgi ana garim, ana guma guara gegap ki. Ana kav, ana guigira wo mbevav, ana Fhe Bakɨme nzuai buni zɨn vov kav, ana vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme vuzvuga zɨn vov, rimgi. Ahaŋ, ana mbara muuŋgiap, ana vuzvuga zɨn vov, kav, mbe ana ndim, khanarareŋ ga ntorgim, ana rimgi.

2.9: Zo 17.1-5; FG 2.33; Ef 1.20-21; Hi 1.3-4Mba bigɨna nɨɨeŋra nzuav, Fhe Bakɨme ana suirav, ana vun fegim, ana guigira vu guarara ki. Ana zɨ mben ana nɨɨŋgi, mba zɨ ana guigira mba harigi zɨri kambarigi.

2.10: Mt 28.18; Ro 14.11; VB 5.132.10: Ais 45.23Fhe Bakɨme maaŋ muuŋgiap mba zɨ bakɨme Zisas ga nɨɨŋgim, mba Hevenan ki bigi, gu nuianan ki bigi, nuiana piin ki bigi, nta zam, ana nɨman thɨvi phɨrɨv, ana piin kɨrga.
2.11: Zo 13.13; FG 2.36; Ro 10.9; 1 Ko 8.6Nta zam, ana bun suaŋv khaŋ suanga, “Zisas Krais, ana Guma Bakɨme ma.” Mbe mba tɨvar muuŋv, mbe zɨ bakɨmen nzan Ndia Fhe Bakɨmen nɨɨnga.

Nde nan kɨvntogi guari, nde zazera na buni zɨn vui. Nde ntigem, vhɨra mba tɨvara muuŋri. Nde, gu nden han kim, nde ne suaŋv na buni zɨn ŋgɨ thari. Fhuvara. Gu ntigem nde thav saman ki, nde guigira mba buni zɨn ŋgɨri. Fhe Bakɨme taagia nde ndigi, nde ntigem guigira nen rɨvɨv, nde guigira khaŋ tɨgɨp havhargip, ana mba fhura nden mbuigi bigɨn, nde guigira ana ndigiri.
Nza kaŋgi, Fhe Bakɨme nde ndavi vherir ŋgari. Ana nduara wo vuzvugi tɨvir muun zav nden ndavi khavgiap, ana mba tɨvir muunga ŋkasŋkar nde nɨɨŋgi.
Nde za mba mbui bigi, nde mbarara kɨv, ntan muuŋri. Nde buni vhɨrve suaŋv, tamtam wari daaŋ thari.

Nde maaŋ muunga, nde Fhe Bakɨmen tari, mbe bigɨn thuen nde darga fhu. Nde vhɨra bigɨn thueŋ suaŋv simtɨk kɨrga fhu. Nde zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ ndi ndɨɨi buni, nde nta suira havhargip, nde kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi rɨgar vhava ŋaara farar muuŋgip kɨrga. Mba gumgi gu mbigi, mbe tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui tuav, mbe ana thav, mbe tɨvi mbatɨgi vhɨrve ga muuŋgi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, Krais kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi muuŋgi tɨvi ga suaŋv mbe suanga tugar, gu guigira nden tɨvir ndikndigirga. Gu ndikndigɨp, gu khueŋ kaŋgirga, gu mba nden rɨgar ka ŋaara mbatɨga muuŋgi ŋaari gu bigi, gu fhura nta muuŋgi fhuvara.

Nde guigira Zisas khothɨgi tɨv, nde Fhe Bakɨme nzuav ofa mbui fara muuŋgi. Mbe maaŋ muuŋgi, na vɨzɨn mbe wain farar muuŋgip, Fhe Bakɨme ofa muun saŋv, ana siv nden ofa tɨ suarga, gu ne suaŋv ndikndigɨra kɨrga. Gu za nde phorgɨp ndikndigɨrga.
2.18: Fi 3.1; 4.4Mba tɨvara nde vhɨra ndikndigɨri. Nde na phorgɨp guigira ndikndigɨri.
Guma Bakɨme Zisas vuzvuk ma. Ana vuzvugirga, gu Timoti ga sararim, ana vhemkora nden han mbar ŋgɨrga. Ana nden han ŋgɨgɨp, taagi zɨv, na suaŋgirga, na ndav havhargip, gu ndav mbɨrarga.
Na han ki guma the Timoti fara muuŋgi fhuvara. Ana na phorgap ndɨkndɨk bavira kav, ana zazera na phorgap nden kurkurarga tuavi ndi gari.
2.21: 1 Ko 10.24; 10.33; 13.5; 2 T 4.10; 4.16Mba harigi gumgi, mbe wari wo bigira ndɨkndɨgap, mbe guigira Zisas Kraisan ŋaarar muuŋrim, ana ŋgɨrgeŋ ndɨkndɨgi fhuvara.
2.22: 1 Ko 4.17; 1 T 1.2; 2 T 1.2Nde Timotin ŋaarar vhuuŋ gangip, ana kaŋgiri. Ana nan kurkurav Zisasan buna vhuuen ŋaara mbui. Ana tar won ndiar kurav, ŋaara mbui fara muuŋgiap, nan kurkurigi.
Maaŋ muuŋgiap, gu maneŋ rarga khar ki. Ram muuŋgi khesharigi bigeŋ nan hɨgɨrie? Mba bigeŋ nan hɨgɨrim, gu kaŋgip, gu mba bigeŋ zumbugum, gu vhemkora ana sararim, ana nden han mbar ŋgɨrga.
Gu khueŋ khothɨgi, Guma Bakɨme na suaŋv vhemkora tuav fhɨrgirim, gu nde han mbar ŋgɨgɨrga.

Gu kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, gu Epafroditus ga sararim, ana nden han zɨrga. Ana guigira nza phorgap Zisas khothɨgi guma ma. Ana vhɨra na phorga ŋgari guma ma. Ana vhɨra nan khurkhum ma. Ana vhɨra na phorgap ŋka wani tɨgap mba ntara mbui guma ma. Nde nan kurkura zav, ana sarigim, ana nan han zɨgi.
Ana guigira nde ndɨkndɨgap, nde kora mbuav, ana nde ganɨ za mbui. Nde ana rɨɨi kameŋ mbararagi, ana ne nzuav ndav simgi.

Ne guigi guarara. Ana fhum rɨɨv, rimgir zav muuŋgi. Fhe Bakɨme ana kora muuŋgiap, ana kurigim, ana taagia nzerigi. Fhe Bakɨme ara kora mbui fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Ana vhɨra nan kora mbui, ana simtɨk bakɨ the na vharargane vuzvugi fhu.
Maaŋ muuŋgiap, gu guigira ana sararim, ana taagip zɨv, nde ganɨngane vuzvugi. Nde taagi ana ganɨv ndikndigirga. Gu maaŋ muuŋgip na ndav simtɨk vhɨzgirga.
2.29: 1 Ko 16.16-18; Fi 4.10; 1 T 5.17Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde Guma Bakɨmen zɨn panan, nde taagip Epafroditus ganɨv, anan ndikndigɨri. Nde mba khesharigi gumgi, nde zɨ bakɨmen mben nɨɨŋri.

Ana Kraisan ŋaara mbuav kav, rimgir za muuŋgi. Ana nduara won fhava ganɨv nzerara kɨrga nai ndɨkndɨgi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Ana nde nan kura muunga ŋaar, nde mba ŋaarar ana nɨɨŋgim, ana mba ŋaarara ndɨkndɨgi. Ana mba ŋaara ndɨkndɨgap, mba rɨmrɨm khɨgara kav, ana daasuav, mba ŋaara mbui.
